biography:
​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.  

Richard Harper "Rick" Gomez (born June 1, 1972) is a Hispanic American actor. He is known for portraying Sgt. George Luz, in the HBO television miniseries Band of Brothers, and as "Endless Mike" Hellstrom in the cult hit Nickelodeon TV series The Adventures of Pete and Pete.
